title: The Nature
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, International, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Spanish
description: Offers an international buffet with items including vegetables, tofu, and seitan. Many dishes are either gluten-free or sugar-free. Desserts are included but not drinks. Owners speak English, Spanish, Chinese. Apr 2015 reported now food is all vegan. Location is off Grand Via next to number 36.
